message.content:
I need to identify the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is the definition of depreciation.

Looking through the financial statements:

1. In the balance sheet, I can see "Accumulated Depreciation" with an end amount of 45742.50.

2. In the cash flow statement, I can see "Depreciation" with an amount of 45742.50.

3. In the income statement, I can see "Depreciation" with an amount of 45742.50.

These all represent the same concept - the amount of depreciation expense recorded for the period. The value is consistent across all statements.

The systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is therefore 45742.50.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45742.50'} }
```
